column4: I own or use a smartphone for my business activities (ordering, payments, messaging).
column5: I regularly use the internet (WhatsApp/social media) to communicate with customers or suppliers.
column7: I have used any online marketplace (e.g., local delivery apps or e-commerce) to sell my products.
column8: I avoid digital tools because I find them too difficult to use.
column9: Accepting digital payments (UPI/cards) increased the number of customers who buy from me.
column10: Using digital payments helps prevent theft or loss of cash in my shop.
column11: Transaction fees or costs for digital payments are a burden for my business.
column12: Using digital payments made bookkeeping (tracking sales) easier for me.
column13: Using digital tools helped me increase sales and reach new customers beyond my local area.
column14: Digital messaging and ordering helped me get repeat customers and made daily operations faster.
column15: I spend money to maintain digital services (mobile data, phone, app fees).
column16: Digital record-keeping (in apps or spreadsheets) helped me manage purchases and stock.
column17: I worry about fraud or wrong payments when using digital platforms.
column18: I lost money due to digital transactions in the past.
column19: I plan to use more digital tools in the next 12 months.
